Name: Rainy Day Roommate
About the game: Watch our lovely roommates grow more intimate. Hit the keys to the beat to collect hearts. Earn enough hearts to unlock the next level. Relax across 3 levels. Collect enough hearts to unlock additional gallery bonuses. One-handed play as a built in feature!
